content.rendered:
Boston wedding photographer

Because someday, this will all be a blur – let’s make it unforgettable

Boston documentary wedding photographer with a soft spot for multicultural, LGBTQ+, and intimate weddings.

I’m a Boston-based wedding and elopement photographer who captures love in all its forms. I’m especially drawn to multicultural weddings, LGBTQ+ love stories, and intimate celebrations, but no matter the setting, I care most about telling your story with authenticity. My approach is documentary-style with vibrant photos that make you say “that’s so us!”

Some days deserve to be remembered.

When you work with me, you’ll get more than beautiful images; you’ll get an easy and personalized experience from start to finish. I’ll guide you when you need it, blend into the background when you don’t, and help you feel totally at ease in front of the camera. I’m here to capture the moments that matter most, because time will blur these moments, but we can make them unforgettable.

Engagements

Weddings

LGBTQ+ Love Stories

Elopements

Weddings with personality. Engagements with joy. Elopements with all the feels. Take a look around.

I’ve been a photographer since I finished college a decade ago. I chose wedding photography because I’ve always been fascinated by the unique connection and dynamics between couples, and I strive to tell their stories through my lens. If I wasn’t a wedding photographer, I’d probably open a cat cafe or own a food truck. In my spare time, I enjoy quiet moments in nature, summer night walks in the city, and making my partner’s favorite desserts – mango cheesecake, tiramisu, and tres leches.

Learn More

I'm Sam |

Featured Weddings

A closer look at some of my favorite weddings and elopements in Boston and beyond.

  • Weddings
  • Gay Weddings

Belle Mer Gay Wedding, Newport RI – Andrew & Max

A Newport wedding full of love Some weddings feel like they were meant to happen by the ocean. Andrew and Max’s Belle Mer wedding was one of those days where the light, the breeze, and the energy of everyone around...

Read More

Classic Pierce House Tented Wedding in Lincoln, MA

Kayla and Mike’s Pierce House wedding in Lincoln, MA was everything a celebration should be: joyful, relaxed, and filled with heartfelt moments. From their ceremony at St. Brigid’s Parish to a tented reception on the lawn, this day was a...

Read More

Shining Tides Wedding in Mattapoisett, MA – Kate & Aaron’s Summer Celebration

A vibrant Shining Tides wedding in Marion, MA, filled with beach views, heartfelt moments, and a whole squad of flower girls. Candid wedding photography of Kate and Aaron’s day, from emotional Ketubah signing to baseball-themed guestbook.

Read More

Museum of Science Boston Wedding – Lauren & Paul

Lauren and Paul’s Museum of Science Boston wedding was pure magic, from the Charles River views to a tented reception under the city lights. Their love story began in Germany, but celebrating at one of Boston’s most unique wedding venues...

Read More
Show More Weddings

What Couples Say...

Sam made us feel completely at ease from the first moment. We weren’t used to being in front of the camera, but he captured us so naturally and beautifully.

— Elena & Max

Working with Sam was such a joy. The photos felt so personal and true to who we are. We’re forever grateful for these memories.

— Kate & Will

Sam is an amazing talent. He has a unique eye for capturing the beauty of simple moments in such a candid and natural way. When looking for a wedding photographer we wanted a photographer who could capture the emotions of the day in a way that would honor simplicity and elegance.

— Steve & Xavier

In case you're wondering...

How would you describe your photography style?

My style is candid, colorful, and story-driven. I focus on capturing real moments—big emotions, quiet glances, and everything in between—without stiff poses or forced smiles. If you’re into photos that actually feel like your day, we’ll get along great.

How far in advance should we book you?

Popular dates fill up fast (especially spring and fall), so I recommend booking 9–12 months out. That said, don’t hesitate to reach out even if your wedding is sooner—I might still have availability!

What’s included in your wedding packages?

All packages include a pre-wedding consultation, high-resolution edited images, an online gallery for sharing, and printing rights. I also offer full-day coverage, micro wedding options, and custom packages for unique celebrations. Take a look at my photography packages.

Will you be the one photographing our wedding?

100%. When you hire me, you get me. I may bring a second shooter depending on your package, but I’ll be there for all the key moments.

When will we get our photos?

You’ll receive a sneak peek within a few days, and your full gallery will be ready in 4–6 weeks. I know you’ll be excited to relive the day, so I don’t keep you waiting long!

Let's chat

Have questions or want to check availability? Send me a message, I’m happy to chat.

Contact
